name: Nekoyuru
description:
Nekoyuru is
Using a cat hiding in the room
It is a game that like concentration game.

In the back of the curtain, inside the drawer, under the bed, bookshelf,
The cat is sleeping and lying down freely.

As you clear the game, new cats and new poses will increase.

When playing every day various cats come in the room!
Even if the cat is lying down in an unusual place, please forgive the cat.
